alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN BIG HORN...NORTHEASTERN STILLWATER... AND YELLOWSTONE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Huntley to Pryor. Movement was east at 35 mph. There is an outflow producing strong winds ahead of the thunderstorms as well. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Huntley, Pryor, Shepherd, Billings Heights, Worden, Fort Smith, Billings West End, Ballantine, Broadview, Pompeys Pillar, Molt, Acton, Comanche, Park City, and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Stillwater; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone
